article_title: H&R Block sees growth potential in Affordable Care Act and taxes

article_metadata.news-keywords: h&r, block, tax, season, strategy, outlook, preparation, software
article_metadata.description: H&R Block expects more customers to feel the impact of the Affordable Care Act when they do their taxes early next year, providing a source of growth for the Kansas City-based business.
article_metadata.title: H&R Block sees growth potential in Affordable Care Act and taxes | The Kansas City Star
